participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

socialdev_ppd_01.Description: Cares about others' feelings. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_02.Description: Feels bad for others when they get hurt. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_03.Description: Feels sorry for kids who get picked on. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_04.Description: Would get upset if he/she saw an animal being hurt. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_05.Description: Does not care who he/she hurts to get what he/she wants. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_06.Description: Seems very cold and uncaring. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_07.Description: The feelings of others are unimportant to him/her. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_08.Description: Does things to help other people without being asked. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_09.Description: Tries to cheer up others when they are sad or upset. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_10.Description: Shares things with other people without being asked. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_11.Description: Does things to make others feel good. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_12.Description: Feels guilty if he/she did something that broke the law. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_13.Description: Apologizes to persons he/she has hurt. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_14.Description: Feels bad or guilty when he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_15.Description: Easily admits to being wrong. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_16.Description: Shows no remorse when he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_17.Description: Does not care if he/she is in trouble. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_18.Description: Cares about what is right and wrong. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_19.Description: Does not care about being on time. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_20.Description: Tries to do excellent work in school and work. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_21.Description: Enjoys learning new and interesting things. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_22.Description: Wants everyone to follow the rules  including him/herself. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_23.Description: Works hard on everything. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_24.Description: Always tries his/her best. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_25.Description: Does not care about doing things well. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_26.Description: Cares about how well he/she does in school or work. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_27.Description: Does not like to put the time into doing things well. | 0 = Not at all true; 1=  Somewhat true; 2=  Very true; 3 = Definitely true

socialdev_ppd_29.Description: Had fights with others to show who was on top. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_30.Description: Taken things from other students. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_31.Description: Vandalized something for fun. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_32.Description: Had a gang fight to be cool. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_33.Description: Hurt others to win a game. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_34.Description: Used physical force to get others to do what he/she wants. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_35.Description: Used force to obtain money or things from others. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_36.Description: Threatened and bullied someone. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_37.Description: Made obscene phone calls for fun. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_38.Description: Gotten others to gang up on someone else. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_39.Description: Carried a weapon to use in a fight. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_40.Description: Yelled at others so they would do things for him/her. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_41.Description: Yelled at others when they have annoyed him/her. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_42.Description: Reacted angrily when provoked by others. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_43.Description: Gotten angry when frustrated. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_44.Description: Had temper tantrums. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_45.Description: Damaged things because he/she felt mad. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_46.Description: Become angry or mad when he/she doesn't get his/her way. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_47.Description: Gotten angry or mad when he/she lost a game. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_48.Description: Gotten angry when others threatened him/her. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_49.Description: Felt better after hitting or yelling at someone. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_50.Description: Hit others to defend him/herself. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often

socialdev_ppd_51.Description: Gotten angry or mad  or hit others when teased. | 0 = Never; 1 = Sometimes; 2=  Often
